name: Gozreh's Trident
text: A 4-foot-long, blazing, forked bolt of electricity springs forth from your hand. You wield this spear-like bolt as if it were a trident (you are considered proficient with the bolt). Attacks with Gozreh’s trident are melee touch attacks. The bolt deals 1d8 points of electricity damage + 1 point per 2 caster levels (maximum +10). Since the bolt is immaterial, your Strength modifier does not apply to the damage. The bolt can ignite combustible materials such as parchment, straw, dry sticks, and cloth.
text_zh: 一根4尺长，发著炽光的雷电叉从你的手中浮现。你挥舞着这长矛状的闪电如同一根三叉戟(而你擅长这束闪电)。使用哥兹莱的三叉戟进行攻击是个近战接触攻击。这束闪亮造成1d8点+1点/2施法者等级(最多+10)的雷电伤害。因为这束闪电没有实体，你的力量调整值不能应用到它的伤害上。这束闪电可以点燃易燃材质，像是羊皮纸、稻草、干柴以及衣物。
